titles.title: Maurice (Mo) Bailey Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Grant Reauthorization Act of 2016

A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations to the Department of Veterans Affairs for purposes of awarding grants to veterans service organizations for the transportation of highly rural veterans.
Maurice (Mo) Bailey Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Grant Reauthorization Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Maurice (Mo) Bailey Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Grant Reauthorization Act of 2016
This bill amends the Caregivers and Veterans Omnibus Health Services Act of 2010 to reauthorize through FY2017 a grant program to provide innovative transportation options to veterans in highly rural areas.
